violation.message: CompoundWordsShouldBeCasedCorrectly - The compound word 'HyperLink' in member name 'Login.RegisterHyperLink' exists as a discrete term. If your usage is intended to be single word, case it as 'Hyperlink' or strip the first token entirely if it represents any sort of Hungarian notation.
violation.popup-message: Avoid creating compound words from terms which exist in the dictionary as discrete terms. Do not create a compound word such as 'StopWatch' or 'PopUp'. These terms are recognized in the dictionary and should be cased as 'Stopwatch' and 'Popup'.

violation.message: UsePreferredTerms - Replace the term 'Login' in member name 'Login.LoginUser' with the preferred alternate 'LogOn'.
violation.popup-message: Use preferred terms over deprecated alternates.

violation.message: UsePreferredTerms - Replace the term 'Login' in type name 'Login' with the preferred alternate 'LogOn'.
violation.popup-message: Use preferred terms over deprecated alternates.
